text: Eitse hoba mora oa hae a fihlele lilemo tsa bohlankana, eaba Abrahama o re: “Mora’ka! Ke lorile toro hore ke lokela ho etsa sehlabelo ka uena. Joale, u hopola joang?” Eaba mora oa hae o re: “Oho ntate! Etsa kamoo u laetsoeng kateng. Etsoe thatong ea Allah, u tla mphumana ke le mamello le tsitlallo.”
